passages.text:
The snows are falling and white winds are blowing, meanwhile you are lost on your path to COVID testing site. You feel cold and helpless.

Whoosh! A white-haired lady in a pink robe appeared in front of you. 

"My name is Gramma R. My magic can guide you to your desire, only if you have enough command of GRAMMAR!" 

Gramma R waves a shiny purple wand elegantly and fairy dusts gathered into words in mid-air: "Every possible means _____ ." 

Three Portals with writings on them appeared before you.

[[Go to the portal saying "has tried"->Portal A]]
[[Go to the portal saying "has been tried"->Portal B]]
[[Go to the portal saying "were tried"->Portal C]]

links.name: Go to the portal saying "has tried"
Go to the portal saying "has been tried"
Go to the portal saying "were tried"

passages.name: Winter Road

passages.text:
A grey wolf as large as a truck is inside portal. It is dashing to you with all its speed, with fangs of your size.

[[Jump back into the portal to resume->Winter Road]]

links.name: Jump back into the portal to resume

passages.name: Portal A

passages.text:
Warm air and friendly nurses are surrounding you. Congradulations! You arrived at COVID testing site!
[[Play Again->Winter Road]]
passages.name: Portal B

passages.text:
Crack! The Montain in front of portal starts to peel tons of snow onto you. It's an avalanche!
[[Jump back into portal to resume->Winter Road]]

links.name: Jump back into portal to resume

passages.name: Portal C
